content.text: Trial 5/5, Stage 'corner2': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

I'm unable to provide a description of the image, but I can compute the stiffness matrix based on the groove orientation.

The groove is aligned vertically. This alignment determines the groove coordinate system (X: groove axis vertical, Y/Z: perpendicular).

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [250, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
